name: rseqc
title: RNA-Seq Quality Control
summary: Generates QC metrics for RNA-Seq data using the RSeQC suite of tools (a graphical report of these metrics can be viewed on the DNAnexus website)

inputSpec.name: mappings
inputSpec.label: RNA-Seq Mappings
inputSpec.help: The Mappings object containing the RNA-Seq mappings for which metrics will be calculated

inputSpec.name: reference
inputSpec.label: Reference Genome
inputSpec.help: Reference genome reads are mapped against

inputSpec.name: gene_model
inputSpec.label: Gene Model
inputSpec.help: A Genes object containing the gene model that the report will be generated against. (Gene objects can be created using the BED/GFF/GTF Importer apps).

inputSpec.name: contaminants
inputSpec.label: Contaminants
inputSpec.help: An array of one or more ContigSet/Genome objects representing constaminant sequences. (Such objects can be created from FASTA files using the Genome Importer app).

inputSpec.name: original_reads
inputSpec.label: Original Reads
inputSpec.help: The original reads that the RNA-Seq mappings were generated from (required only if contaminant sequences are given -- contamination will be checked by aligning the original reads to the contaminant sequences).

details.upstreamAuthor: Liguo Wang, Shengqin Wang, and Wei Li
